Class ContextClassLoaderExtender

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.gabrys.maven.plugin.util.classpath.ContextClassLoaderExtender

extends Object

        Filters artifacts based on the type.
        Parameters:

        types - the supported types.
        Returns:
